passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

ancestry: html > body > main:nth-child(6) > div:nth-child(3) > div > div > h1:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(9) > footer:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(4) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(9) > footer:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(5) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(9) > footer:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > section:nth-child(1) > header:nth-child(2) > h1
